verbose_text: Therefore, we explore the role of 4-1BB pathway during crystalline silica induced lung injury and find that a specific inhibitor blocking the pathway could effectively alleviate crystalline silica induced lung inflammation and subsequent pulmonary fibrosis in vivo.
evidence: 4-1BB pathway during crystalline silica-induced lung injury and find that a specific inhibitor blocking the pathway could effectively alleviate crystalline silica-induced lung inflammation
